review: My Roku and Apple TV work with both my TVs, but Google's device fails and offers no useful configuration guidance."reconnect me" is its most specific technical advice. On the Android tablet end, I get "we recommend not stting up this Chromecast until you can verify the PIN." Which I cannot. A Google device at any price point should at least guide the user thru the configuration task and work as advertised.
author: James Egitto

review: This is great when you can get it near a wireless router so that the signal is strong. My signal was not at first and I was getting frustrated. I purchased the TP-LINK TL-WPA4220 300Mbps AV500 WiFi Powerline Add-On Extender (I already had a powerline adapter by my router) and it fixed the problem. I now love the Chromecast stick.
